Vanessa Marcil's dating history, refers to the romantic relationships and associations of the American actress. She has been involved in several high-profile relationships throughout her career.

Marcil's most notable relationships include her marriage to actor Carmine Giovinazzo from 2010 to 2013, her engagement to actor Brian Austin Green from 2001 to 2003, and her relationship with actor Jason Priestly from 1999 to 2000.

Marcil's dating history has been a subject of media attention and speculation, and she has been open about her relationships in interviews and on social media.
